BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-Struts
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: Add bonds between atoms of a molecule to strengthen it for 3-d printing.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: Command :: struts :: Molecular structure :: provide struts for 3D printing
Command :: ~struts :: Molecular structure :: remove 3D printing struts
